subject: Federal Reserve Bank of New
body:
Federal Reserve Bank of New York
33 Liberty Street
New York, NY 10045
13/11/2023
 
 
Dear Beneficiary,
 
This is to inform you that we have finally received instructions from the Department of Treasury and the United Nations (Joint payment verification team and the World Bank ) to release your long delayed payment sum of $3.7M 
However, we have received a notice of Change of Account from your next of kin Mr. Julius Fletcher last Friday. In respect to the account received from him, we wish to confirm with you before we proceed with the transfer of your contract fund to the new account he provided.
 
Kindly confirm the below new bank account as valid and endorsed by you for the transfer of your unpaid contract fund.
 
Bank; Bank of America
Address; 690 Adams Street Quincy Ma 02169 USA
A/C Number: 4666 0133 5222
Routing Number: 011000138
Swift Code: BOFAUS3N
A\C Name: Julius Fletcher
 
The transfer will take place immediately you confirm the authenticity new bank account information provided by Mr. Julius Fletcher. I demand an urgent response from you to enable us to proceed with the transfer.
 
Best Regards,
Martin Navarro 
Director Payment Unit 
Federal Reserve Bank

subject: Re:   Federal Reserve Bank of New
body:
Hello Martin Navarro,

Thank you for your message. It's quite surprising to hear about this change of account from Mr. Julius Fletcher. I must admit, I don't recall endorsing any such changes recently.

Could you please provide more details about when and how this change was requested? Also, could you clarify the relationship between Mr. Julius Fletcher and myself that would allow him to make such a request?

I'm looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Robin
